SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.berezin.markdown.formatable

Interface Formatable

All Superinterfaces:
Serialized
All Known Implementing Classes:
Code, CodeBlock, Image, Link, RawText, Text
public interface Formatable extends Serialized
Anything that text format (italic, bold, etc.) can be applied to. Formattable shouldn't store any formatting information, but rather just return the text that should be serialized. Formattable shouldn't store any Element, only other Formatables.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from interface ru.nsu.berezin.markdown.Serialized

    serialized
